component.script: function init() m.top.setFocus(true) m.myLabel = m.top.findNode("myLabel") m.myLabel.font.size=150 m.myLabel.color="0xCCCCCC" end function function onKeyEvent(key as String, press as Boolean) as Boolean m.showMeLabel = m.top.findNode("showMeLabel") if (key = "up") then m.showMeLabel.visible = true Print "you clicked up" end if if (key = "down") then m.showMeLabel.visible = false Print "you clicked down" end if return true end function
